MonsterTrait.Name: Blood Frenzy
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

MonsterTrait.Name: Limited Amphibiousness
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shark Telepathy
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The sahuagin makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws or trident.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Trident
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
